system:
note description: "Objects that hold the current formatting applied while loading a RTF file." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." author: "" date: "$Date: 2013-01-28 17:14:10 -0800 (Mon, 28 Jan 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 91071 $"
class ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xmlRTF_FORMAT_I
inherit ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS rename ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignmentAlignment as ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignmentAlignment_constant, ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_left_marginLeft_margin as ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_left_marginLeft_margin_constant, ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_right_marginRight_margin as ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_right_marginRight_margin_constant, ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_top_spacingTop_spacing as ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_top_spacingTop_spacing_constant, ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_bottom_spacingBottom_spacing as ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_bottom_spacingBottom_spacing_constant redefine ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_default_createdefault_create end
create ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_default_createdefault_create
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_default_create../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_default_createdefault_create -- Create Current do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_alignmentalignment := ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_leftAlignment_left ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals end
feature -- Access
f_highlight_color../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_colorhighlight_color: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Highlighting applied to text.
f_highlight_set../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_sethighlight_set: FalseBOOLEAN -- Has ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_colorhighlight_color been explicitly set and does not correspond to auto?
f_text_color../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_text_colortext_color: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Text color of format
f_color_set../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_color_setcolor_set: FalseBOOLEAN -- Has ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_text_colortext_color been explicitly set and does not correspond to auto?
f_is_bold../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_boldis_bold: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is format bold?
f_is_italic../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_italicis_italic: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is format italic?
f_is_striked_out../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_striked_outis_striked_out: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is format striken out?
f_is_underlined../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_underlinedis_underlined: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is format underlined?
f_vertical_offset../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_vertical_offsetvertical_offset: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Vertical offset in pixels.
f_font_height../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_font_heightfont_height: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Height of font used by format.
f_character_format../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_character_formatcharacter_format: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Current character format index.
f_boolean_out../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_boolean_outboolean_out (a_boolean: FalseBOOLEAN): FalseSTRING_8 do if a_boolean then Result := ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_true_constantTrue_constant else Result := ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_false_constantFalse_constant end end
f_true_constant../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_true_constantTrue_constant: FalseSTRING_8 = "T"
f_false_constant../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_false_constantFalse_constant: FalseSTRING_8 = "F"
f_character_format_out../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_character_format_outcharacter_format_out: FalseSTRING_8 -- Result is representation of character format attributes of Current. -- Paragraph and formats need to be buffered independently, hence a -- separate out feature for each of these set of attributes. do if attached ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_character_format_outinternal_character_format_out as l_internal_character_format_out then Result := l_internal_character_format_out else create Result.Falsemake (30) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_colorhighlight_color) Result.Falseappend (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_boolean_outboolean_out (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_boldis_bold)) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_character_formatcharacter_format) Result.Falseappend (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_boolean_outboolean_out (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_italicis_italic)) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_font_heightfont_height) Result.Falseappend (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_boolean_outboolean_out (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_striked_outis_striked_out)) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_text_colortext_color) Result.Falseappend (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_boolean_outboolean_out (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_underlinedis_underlined)) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_vertical_offsetvertical_offset) Result.Falseappend (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_boolean_outboolean_out (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_sethighlight_set)) Result.Falseappend (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_boolean_outboolean_out (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_color_setcolor_set)) ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_character_format_outinternal_character_format_out := Result end end
feature -- Access
f_alignment../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_alignmentalignment: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Alignment of text.
f_bottom_spacing../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Bottom spacing
f_top_spacing../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Top spacing
f_right_margin../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_right_marginright_margin: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Right margin
f_left_margin../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Left margin
f_reset_paragraph../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_paragraphreset_paragraph -- Ensure all paragraph formatting attributes are reset to -- default values. do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_alignmentalignment := ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_leftAlignment_left ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin := 0 ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_right_marginright_margin := 0 ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing := 0 ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing := 0 ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_alignmentalignment = ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_leftAlignment_left ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin = 0 ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_right_marginright_margin = 0 ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing = 0 ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing = 0 end
f_paragraph_format_out../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_paragraph_format_outparagraph_format_out: FalseSTRING_8 -- Result is representation of paragraph format attributes of Current. -- Paragraph and formats need to be buffered independently, hence a -- separate out fetaure for each of these set of attributes. do if attached ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_paragraph_format_outinternal_paragraph_format_out as l_internal_paragraph_format_out then Result := l_internal_paragraph_format_out else create Result.Falsemake (16) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_alignmentalignment) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_right_marginright_margin) Result.Falseappend_integer (../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin) ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_paragraph_format_outinternal_paragraph_format_out := Result end end
feature -- Element change
f_set_bottom_spacing../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_bottom_spacingset_bottom_spacing (a_bottom_spacing: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing to a_bottom_spacing. require a_bottom_spacing_non_negative: a_bottom_spacing >= 0 do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing := a_bottom_spacing ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure bottom_spacing_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing = a_bottom_spacing end
f_set_top_spacing../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_top_spacingset_top_spacing (a_top_spacing: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing to a_top_spacing. require a_top_spacing_non_negative: a_top_spacing >= 0 do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing := a_top_spacing ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure top_spacing_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing = a_top_spacing end
f_set_right_margin../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_right_marginset_right_margin (a_right_margin: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_right_marginright_margin to a_right_margin. require a_right_margin_non_negative: a_right_margin >= 0 do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_right_marginright_margin := a_right_margin ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure right_margin_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_right_marginright_margin = a_right_margin end
f_set_left_margin../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_left_marginset_left_margin (a_left_margin: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin to a_left_margin. require a_left_margin_non_negative: a_left_margin >= 0 do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin := a_left_margin ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure left_margin_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin = a_left_margin end
f_set_highlight_color../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_highlight_colorset_highlight_color (a_highlight_color: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_colorhighlight_color to a_highlight_color. require a_highlight_color_non_negative: a_highlight_color >= 0 do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_colorhighlight_color := a_highlight_color ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_sethighlight_set := True ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure highlight_color_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_colorhighlight_color = a_highlight_color end
f_set_text_color../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_text_colorset_text_color (a_text_color: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_text_colortext_color to a_text_color. require a_text_color_non_negative: a_text_color >= 0 do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_text_colortext_color := a_text_color ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_color_setcolor_set := True ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure text_color_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_text_colortext_color = a_text_color end
f_set_bold../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_boldset_bold (a_is_bold: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_boldis_bold to a_is_bold. do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_boldis_bold := a_is_bold ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure is_bold_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_boldis_bold = a_is_bold end
f_set_italic../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_italicset_italic (an_is_italic: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_italicis_italic to an_is_italic. do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_italicis_italic := an_is_italic ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure is_italic_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_italicis_italic = an_is_italic end
f_set_striked_out../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_striked_outset_striked_out (an_is_striked_out: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_striked_outis_striked_out to an_is_striked_out. do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_striked_outis_striked_out := an_is_striked_out ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure is_striked_out_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_striked_outis_striked_out = an_is_striked_out end
f_set_underlined../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_underlinedset_underlined (an_is_underlined: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_underlinedis_underlined to an_is_underlined. do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_underlinedis_underlined := an_is_underlined ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure is_underlined: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_is_underlinedis_underlined = an_is_underlined end
f_set_vertical_offset../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_vertical_offsetset_vertical_offset (an_offset: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_vertical_offsetvertical_offset to an_offset. do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_vertical_offsetvertical_offset := an_offset ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure offset_set: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_vertical_offsetvertical_offset = an_offset end
f_set_font_height../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_font_heightset_font_height (a_font_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_font_heightfont_height to a_font_height. require a_font_height_positive: a_font_height > 0 do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_font_heightfont_height := a_font_height ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure font_height_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_font_heightfont_height = a_font_height end
f_set_character_format../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_character_formatset_character_format (a_character_format: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_character_formatcharacter_format to a_character_format. require a_character_format_non_negative: a_character_format >= 0 do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_character_formatcharacter_format := a_character_format ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure character_format_assigned: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_character_formatcharacter_format = a_character_format end
f_set_alignment../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_set_alignmentset_alignment (an_alignment: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_alignmentalignment to an_alignment. require valid_alignment: ../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_valid_alignmentvalid_alignment (an_alignment) do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_alignmentalignment := an_alignment ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals ensure alignment_set: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_alignmentalignment = an_alignment end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_internal_character_format_out../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_character_format_outinternal_character_format_out: detachable FalseSTRING_8 -- Once per object for ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_character_format_outcharacter_format_out.
f_internal_paragraph_format_out../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_paragraph_format_outinternal_paragraph_format_out: detachable FalseSTRING_8 -- Once per object for ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_paragraph_format_outparagraph_format_out.
f_reset_internals../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_reset_internalsreset_internals -- Reset ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_character_format_outinternal_character_format_out. do ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_character_format_outinternal_character_format_out := Void ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_paragraph_format_outinternal_paragraph_format_out := Void ensure internal_character_format_out_reset: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_internal_character_format_outinternal_character_format_out = Void end
invariant character_format_non_negative: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_character_formatcharacter_format >= 0 font_height_non_negative: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_font_heightfont_height >= 0 text_color_non_negative: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_text_colortext_color >= 0 highlight_color_non_negative: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_highlight_colorhighlight_color >= 0 left_margin_non_negative: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin >= 0 right_margin_non_negative: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_right_marginright_margin >= 0 top_spacing_non_negative: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing >= 0 bottom_spacing_non_negative: ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing >= 0

end -- class ../implementation_interface/rtf_format_i.xmlRTF_FORMAT_I
